Class¶

class Data(name=None, data_X=None, data_Y=None, dtype=None, pars_central=None, pars_pos_poi=None, pars_pos_nuis=None, pars_labels=None, pars_bounds=None, test_fraction=None, load_on_RAM=False, output_folder=None, input_file=None, verbose=True)[source]¶

This class contains the Data object representing the dataset used for training, validating and testing the DNNLikelihood. It can be creaded both feeding X and Y data or by loading an existing Data object.
